page.title: 04A DAY AT FAIR OAK SCHOOL
page.content: The school day lasts six hours and thirty minutes. We start at 9.00 and finish at 3.30 in the afternoon. In that time we have Maths, English, Project, Games, dinner and playtime. Playtime is at 10.30 until 10.45 and from 2.15 to 2.30. Dinner starts at 12.00 and finishes at 1.00. For dinner you choose from dinners from school at 65p. per day or sandwiches from home or you can go home for dinner. Most people bring sandwiches. For Games we play football for the boys, netball for the girls or rounders. Also we have P.E. where we use mats, ropes and benches. Sometimes we have sports days and special rounders,netball and football matches between the four houses. At the end of term we have a Padder Tennis competition which we can enter. We have Music,TV. and the computer.
